mapper.select: select WS.id, WS.member_id, WS.name, WS.head_count from (select * from TEAM_MEMBER where MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}) TM inner join WORK_SPACE WS on TM.WORK_SPACE_ID = WS.ID order by decode(WS.MEMBER_ID, #{memberId}, 1), WS.ID desc

select WS.ID, WS.MEMBER_ID, WS.NAME, WS.INVITATION_CODE, WS.HEAD_COUNT, M.ID m_id, M.NAME m_name from (select id, member_id, name, invitation_code, head_count from WORK_SPACE where ID = #{workSpaceId} and MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}) WS inner join TEAM_MEMBER TM on WS.ID = TM.WORK_SPACE_ID inner join MEMBER M on TM.MEMBER_ID = M.ID order by decode(m_id, #{memberId}, 1)

select WS.ID, WS.MEMBER_ID, WS.NAME, WS.INVITATION_CODE, WS.HEAD_COUNT, M.ID m_id, M.NAME m_name from (select id, member_id, name, invitation_code, head_count from WORK_SPACE where INVITATION_CODE = #{invitationCode}) WS inner join TEAM_MEMBER TM on WS.ID = TM.WORK_SPACE_ID inner join MEMBER M on TM.MEMBER_ID = M.ID
mapper.insert: insert into WORK_SPACE(id, member_id, name, invitation_code, head_count) VALUES (WORK_SPACE_SEQ.nextval, #{memberId}, #{name}, #{invitationCode}, #{headCount})
